definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: to, at, beside (der. uncertain; v. K:128 n.; perhaps akin to [[לָוׇה]], [[לְוִי]], lwiy join; Targum [[לְוׇת]], Syr. lwot  to), c. [[מִן]], Ezr 4:12 the Jews which came up [[מִן־לְוׇתָח]] from thee (de chez toi; cf. men lwot, [[מִלְּוַת]], e.g. Ex 8:8, Ex 9:33 SyrVer Targum = Heb. [[מֵעִם]]).
